  • 所有已知实现类:
    Aggressive, Benevolent, Cheater, Human, Random

    Interface of Strategy

    • 方法详细资料

      • reinforcementPhase

        void reinforcementPhase(PlayerModel player)
        interface definition of reinforcement
        参数:
        player - the player will enter reinforcement phase

      • attackPhase

        int attackPhase(PlayerModel player)
        interface definition of attack
        参数:
        player - the player will enter attack phase
        返回:
        1- no possible attack 2-finished by player

        void fortificationPhase(PlayerModel player)
        interface definition of fortification
        参数:
        player - the player will enter fortification phase
